name: GeniXCMS
short_description: GeniXCMS is a PHP Based Content Management System and Framework (CMSF). It's a simple and lightweight of CMSF. Very suitable for Intermediate PHP developer to Advanced Developer. Some manual configurations are needed to make this application to work. If You don't have a programming skills, please don't bother to download this. It will harm You anyway.
